pages.text: This architecture cannot be used as a single block and must be built as a multi-block structure. $(br2) It is a core that absorbs a player's $(5)EMC$() and converts it into $(2)Vis$(). $(br2) Once the multi-block structure is built, when a player is within five blocks of the core, it will consume the player's $(5)EMC$() and replenish the $(2)Vis$() in the current chunk.
Multi-block structure: $(br2) I haven't figured it out yet.
